name: cosequin_canada
description: This is just to run ejs templates on my Cosequin Canada stack

scripts.compile: npx ejs ./src/index.ejs -o ./build/index.html -f ./src/data/index.json; npx ejs ./src/products.ejs -o ./build/dog_products.html -f ./src/data/dog-product.json; npx ejs ./src/products.ejs -o ./build/cat_products.html -f ./src/data/cat-products.json; npx ejs ./src/product-page.ejs -o ./build/cosequin-msm-omega3.html -f ./src/data/dog-chews.json;
